text: Ana hige'za Babiloni sondia vahe'mo'za Jerusalemi kuma kegina tapage hu'za ufre'naze. Hagi Babiloni sondia vahe'mo'za Jerusalemi kumara avazagi kagi'nazanagi, Zedekaia'ene ana maka sondia vahe'mo'za kenage atirami'za, kini ne'mofo hozama me'nerega tare kazigati keginamokema eme rehe'na'a amu'nompima me'nea kahanteti atirami'za Araba kaziga vu'naze.
